mapper.sql: p.id,p.status, p.schoolName ,p.realName, p.personIDCard, p.personPhoneNumber, p.personIDCardJustOriginal, p.personIDCardJustTreatment, p.personIDCardBackOriginal, p.personIDCardBackTreatment, p.userID, p.createTime, p.updateTime, p.version, p.isDeleted, p.createBy, p.updateBy

where 1=1 and p.id = #{condition.id} and p.schoolName = #{condition.schoolName} and p.realName = #{condition.realName} and p.personIDCard = #{condition.personIDCard} and p.personPhoneNumber = #{condition.personPhoneNumber} and p.personIDCardJustOriginal = #{condition.personIDCardJustOriginal} and p.personIDCardJustTreatment = #{condition.personIDCardJustTreatment} and p.personIDCardBackOriginal = #{condition.personIDCardBackOriginal} and p.personIDCardBackTreatment = #{condition.personIDCardBackTreatment} and p.userID = #{condition.userID} and p.createTime = #{condition.createTime} and p.updateTime = #{condition.updateTime} and p.version = #{condition.version} and p.isDeleted = #{condition.isDeleted} and p.createBy = #{condition.createBy} and p.updateBy = #{condition.updateBy} and p.status = #{condition.status}

where 1=1 and p.id = #{condition.id} and UPPER(p.schoolName) LIKE UPPER(CONCAT(CONCAT('%',#{condition.schoolName}),'%')) and UPPER(p.realName) LIKE UPPER(CONCAT(CONCAT('%',#{condition.realName}),'%')) and UPPER(p.personIDCard) LIKE UPPER(CONCAT(CONCAT('%',#{condition.personIDCard}),'%')) and UPPER(p.personPhoneNumber) LIKE UPPER(CONCAT(CONCAT('%',#{condition.personPhoneNumber}),'%')) and UPPER(p.personIDCardJustOriginal) LIKE UPPER(CONCAT(CONCAT('%',#{condition.personIDCardJustOriginal}),'%')) and UPPER(p.personIDCardJustTreatment) LIKE UPPER(CONCAT(CONCAT('%',#{condition.personIDCardJustTreatment}),'%')) and UPPER(p.personIDCardBackOriginal) LIKE UPPER(CONCAT(CONCAT('%',#{condition.personIDCardBackOriginal}),'%')) and UPPER(p.personIDCardBackTreatment) LIKE UPPER(CONCAT(CONCAT('%',#{condition.personIDCardBackTreatment}),'%')) and UPPER(p.userID) LIKE UPPER(CONCAT(CONCAT('%',#{condition.userID}),'%')) and UPPER(p.createTime) LIKE UPPER(CONCAT(CONCAT('%',#{condition.createTime}),'%')) and UPPER(p.updateTime) LIKE UPPER(CONCAT(CONCAT('%',#{condition.updateTime}),'%')) and UPPER(p.version) LIKE UPPER(CONCAT(CONCAT('%',#{condition.version}),'%')) and UPPER(p.isDeleted) LIKE UPPER(CONCAT(CONCAT('%',#{condition.isDeleted}),'%')) and UPPER(p.createBy) LIKE UPPER(CONCAT(CONCAT('%',#{condition.createBy}),'%')) and UPPER(p.updateBy) LIKE UPPER(CONCAT(CONCAT('%',#{condition.updateBy}),'%'))
mapper.update: update personalauthen set schoolName=#{schoolName}, realName=#{realName}, personIDCard=#{personIDCard}, personPhoneNumber=#{personPhoneNumber}, personIDCardJustOriginal=#{personIDCardJustOriginal}, personIDCardJustTreatment=#{personIDCardJustTreatment}, personIDCardBackOriginal=#{personIDCardBackOriginal}, personIDCardBackTreatment=#{personIDCardBackTreatment}, userID=#{userID}, createTime=#{createTime}, updateTime=#{updateTime}, version=#{version}, isDeleted=#{isDeleted}, createBy=#{createBy}, updateBy=#{updateBy}, status=#{status}, where id=#{id} and version = #{version}-1
mapper.select: select from personalauthen p where p.id = #{id} and p.isDeleted = false
mapper.sql: p.id as 'id',p.status as 'status', p.version as 'version',p.schoolName as 'schoolName',p.realName as 'realName',p.personIDCard as 'personIDCard',p.personPhoneNumber as 'personPhoneNumber',p.personIDCardJustOriginal as 'personIDCardJustOriginal', gzAttachment.id as 'gzAttachment.id', gzAttachment.version as 'gzAttachment.version',gzAttachment.datestr as 'gzAttachment.datestr',gzAttachment.path as 'gzAttachment.path',gzAttachment.name as 'gzAttachment.name',gzAttachment.title as 'gzAttachment.title',gzAttachment.type as 'gzAttachment.type',gzAttachment.refID as 'gzAttachment.refID',p.personIDCardJustTreatment as 'personIDCardJustTreatment',p.personIDCardBackOriginal as 'personIDCardBackOriginal', gfAttachment.id as 'gfAttachment.id', gfAttachment.version as 'gfAttachment.version',gfAttachment.datestr as 'gfAttachment.datestr',gfAttachment.path as 'gfAttachment.path',gfAttachment.name as 'gfAttachment.name',gfAttachment.title as 'gfAttachment.title',gfAttachment.type as 'gfAttachment.type',gfAttachment.refID as 'gfAttachment.refID',p.personIDCardBackTreatment as 'personIDCardBackTreatment',p.userID as 'userID'
mapper.select: select from personalauthen p left join attachment gzAttachment on p.personIDCardJustOriginal = gzAttachment.id left join attachment gfAttachment on p.personIDCardBackOriginal = gfAttachment.id ${orderByClause} limit 0,1

SELECT personalauthen.realName as 'name', 1 as 'type',personalauthen.id,personalauthen.createTime,personalauthen.personIDCard as 'cardID' FROM personalauthen WHERE personalauthen.`userID` IN ( SELECT b.`createBy` FROM beenrecruited b WHERE positionID IN (SELECT p.`ID` FROM POSITION p WHERE p.`userID` = #{condition.userID} ) AND b.`createTime` > DATE_SUB(NOW(),INTERVAL 3 DAY) ) AND( UPPER(personalauthen.realName) LIKE UPPER(CONCAT(CONCAT('%',#{condition.name}),'%')) OR UPPER(personalauthen.personIDCard) LIKE UPPER(CONCAT(CONCAT('%',#{condition.name}),'%')) ) order by personalauthen.createTime
